TopicTitle: Ksp TV on twitch in 30 mins is about to talk about the next update. Im excited! :3

Articles.Content:
ANYONE ELSE? I wonder what Squad has been working on as of late. My guess is something that makes the game better

Tell everyone & their mothers
What gives you the idea that discussion of new stuff is on tap tonight? Did the devs or community leaders mention that somewhere?

What gives you the idea that discussion of new stuff is on tap tonight? Did the devs or community leaders mention that somewhere?

Yes they said last week they would talk about it on this stream

Yes they said last week they would talk about it on this stream

Gotcha, thanks.
Cool, cheers for the heads up
Thanks for the reminder, I ALWAYS miss it!

Thanks for the reminder, I ALWAYS miss it!

Yeah me too.
There's some kind of delay according to kofeyh. Hopefully Max and co will be here soon
What time is this supposed to start? Theres just some kid playing the game right now
It is on now I think

Yep, it's on. Let's go! Also, it's Rows, not Max. And of course Yargnit is here. Sorry about my mistake

Edited February 1, 2014 by Jodo42
Details, details, details! Can anyone brief the Whack? Must office, can't watch stream.
Technical difficulties and timing be darned! We've got announcements ahoy on Tuesday. 0.24 stuff, NASA stuff and a contest where you can find some of your proud work (not mods) in the game.
Oh. So the stream did not go today?
It's happening right now haha.
Stream's ending up atm; no real updates on .24. Apparantly we're getting a competition soon though, that'll let us "permanently change the game." Tuesday it is, gents.

A contest where you can find some of your proud work (not mods) in the game.

Somehow this one excites me the most.Too bad I can't tune in(probably)

I forgot to mention this; I probably should've mentioned this. Max said there's been some considerations regarding "buffing" ion engines while increasing their resource intake, because they're not very viable ingame atm.
Correction and surround the words buffed ions in bright light with angelic music.

I forgot to mention this; I probably should've mentioned this. Max said there's been some considerations regarding "buffing" ion engines while increasing their resource intake, because they're not very viable ingame atm.

They got nerfed from 2kN of thrust to 0.5. IMHO, simply putting them back would be all they need. They did used to be viable.
To the OP: Sorry they disappointed you lol. There may be something on tuesday, but don't get your hopes up.

So there's gonna be a contest to get your ship into the game?

... mwahahaha! I should put together a eleven thousand part monster and somehow win it.

"Oh, look at this ship. Let me click load and OH MY... GOD THE... UNIVERSE JUST... WENT... TO FIVE... FRAMES A... SEC... OND."

Edited February 1, 2014 by Whackjob

Somehow this one excites me the most.Too bad I can't tune in(probably)

Yes, I feel the same way. I think a lot of us will be very interested in learning more about this.

Why is it made so hard to find past Squad cast episodes?

I go to Twitch ksp tv via the link on the forum front page, click "videos" - there's Squad Cast after party but not the Squad Cast. Click on "more videos", same thing. Click on KSP-TV Programming Schedule, does not link to the actual episodes.

Why is it made so hard to find past Squad cast episodes?

I go to Twitch ksp tv via the link on the forum front page, click "videos" - there's Squad Cast after party but not the Squad Cast. Click on "more videos", same thing. Click on KSP-TV Programming Schedule, does not link to the actual episodes.

Go to the bottom of "videos," click "More Videos," then under the logo hit "Past Broadcasts." For some reason the Squadcasts aren't in the "highlights"...

Here's the one you want. http://www.twitch.tv/ksptv/b/499755778

It's Yargnit landing a massive glider on the Alternis Kerbol Tylo with some banter in the background from Max and Rows. Not a lot of new info.
